recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water according to package instructions.
While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a pan and saut√© the pancetta until crispy. Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix in the grated pecorino and parmesan cheeses.
Drain the pasta, reserving some of the cooking water.
Quickly mix the hot pasta with the pancetta and garlic, then remove from heat.
Stir in the egg and cheese mixture, using some reserved pasta water to achieve a creamy consistency.
Season with freshly ground black pepper and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and chicken broth. Set aside.
Toss the sliced chicken with cornstarch to coat.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok over medium-high heat and stir-fry the chicken until browned. Remove and set aside.
In the same wok, add more oil if needed and stir-fry the garlic, onion, and bell peppers until tender.
Return the chicken to the wok and pour in the sauce mixture.
Cook everything together for a few more minutes until the sauce thickens.
Serve the stir-fry with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Blueberry Pancakes
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, mix the buttermilk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Gradually combine the wet ingredients with the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
Fold in the fresh blueberries.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and spoon the batter into the pan to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with maple syrup or powdered sugar.

recipes.name: Guacamole
instructions: Cut the avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocados with a fork to your desired consistency.
Stir in the lime juice, diced red onion, chopped tomato, minced garlic, and cilantro.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with tortilla chips or use as a topping for tacos.
